en.receive-notification: Players will receive a notification when the queue fills up
en.discord-not-linked: **Sorry! Your Discord is not linked with Steam account! type `q!link` to link it**
en.account-not-linked: Unable to add **{}**: Account is not linked
en.already-in-queue: Unable to add **{}**: Already in the queue
en.queue-is-full: Unable to add **{}**: Queue is full
en.cannot-verify-match: Unable to add **{}**: Cannot verify match status
en.already-in-match: Unable to add **{}**: Already in a match
en.mention-to-remove: Mention a player in the command to remove them
en.capacity-out-range: Capacity is outside of valid range (2-100)
en.queue-emptied-footer: The queue has been emptied because of the capacity change
en.team-pick-footer: React to any of the numbers below to pick the corresponding member
en.picker-not-turn: Picker **{}** is not your turn to pick
en.picker-not-captain: Picker **{}** is not a team captain
en.picker-not-member: Picker **{}** is not a member in the team draft
en.map-veto-footer: React to any of the map icons below to ban the corresponding map
en.members-must-even: members argument must have even length
en.vote-map-footer: React to either of the map icons below to vote for the corresponding map
en.react-ready: React with the {} below to ready up (1 minute)
en.not-ready-removed: The missing players have been removed from the queue
en.no-servers:
**Sorry! Our servers are busy!
Please try again later.**
en.server-message-footer: Server will close after 5 minutes if anyone doesn't join
en.team-method: The current team creation method is {}
en.team-method-already: The current team creation method is already set to {}
en.team-valid-methods: Team creation method must be {}, {} or {}
en.captains-method: The current captain selection method is {}
en.captains-method-already: The current captain selection method is already set to {}
en.captains-valid-method: Captain selection method must be {}, {} or {}
en.map-method: The current map selection method is {}
en.map-method-already: The current map selection method is already set to {}
en.map-valid-method: Map selection method must be {}, {} or {}
en.map-pool-fewer-3: Pool cannot have fewer than 3 maps!
en.already-linked: **Your Discord is already linked with [Steam account]({})**
en.dm-link:
Click this URL to authorize CS:GO League with your Steam account
{}
en.link-sent: **We just sent you DM has the link**
en.blocked-dm: **Sorry! We can't send you link due to your DM is blocked**
en.unknown-error: **Sorry! We can't send you link due to unknown error**
en.already-not-linked: **Sorry! Your Discord is already not linked with any Steam account**
en.force-linked: Player **{}** has force linked to [Steam account]({})
en.cannot-get-stats: Unable to get **{}**'s stats: Account is not linked
en.nobody-ranked: Nobody on this server is ranked!
en.command-link-brief: Link a player on the backend
en.command-unlink-brief: UnLink a player on the backend (Must have admin perms)
en.command-check-brief: Check if account is linked and give linked role
en.command-remove-brief: Remove the mentioned member from the queue (must have server kick perms)
en.command-empty-brief: Empty the queue (must have server kick perms)
en.command-cap-brief: Set the capacity of the queue (Must have admin perms)
en.command-spectators-brief: View/Add/Remove match spectators (Must have admin perms)
en.command-teams-brief: Set or view the team creation method (Must have admin perms)
en.command-captains-brief: Set or view the captain selection method (Must have admin perms)
en.command-maps-brief: Set or view the map selection method (must have admin perms)
en.command-mpool-brief: Add or remove maps from the map pool (must have admin perms)
en.command-end-brief: Force end a match (must have admin perms)
en.command-stats-brief: See your stats in the server
en.command-leaders-brief: See the top players in the server
en.command-about-brief: Display basic info about this bot
en.command-forcelink-brief: Force link a player with a steam id (must have admin perms)
en.bot-description: An easy to use, fully automated system to set up and play CS:GO pickup games
en.use-help: Use `{}help` for a list of commands
en.vote-match-type-footer: React to either of the number icons below to vote for the match type
en.command-ban-brief: Ban all mentioned users from joining the queue (need server ban perms)
en.command-unban-brief: Unban all mentioned users so they can join the queue (need server ban perms)
en.mention-user-to-ban: Mention a user in the command to ban them
en.banned-footer: Banned users have been removed from the queue
en.mention-user-to-unban: Mention a user in the command to unban them
en.unbanned-footer: Unbanned users may now join the queue
en.warning-player-left: Warning: You will banned from join queues {} if you don't rejoin you team channel.
en.banned-player-left: You have been banned from join queues {} because of left your team channel while match is live.
